title.rendered: Dr Selva Pankaj receives Honorary Doctorate Award

content.rendered: Dr Selva Pankaj, Co-Principal, Regent College London received an Honorary Doctorate Award from The University of Bolton on 16th July, 2019. The University of Bolton includes many successful people from various fields in its list of honorary graduates. Each year, the university bestows honorary awards to those who have contributed to the academic work of the university or earned distinction for their services to education, business, culture or the community.
